00026 
00027 #ifndef LBANN_BASE_FACTORY_HPP
00028 #define LBANN_BASE_FACTORY_HPP
00029 
00030 #include <map>
00031 
00032 
00033 using std::shared_ptr;
00034 
00035 namespace lbann
00036 {
00037 
00045 template <typename Method>
00046 class base_factory
00047  {
00048   public:
00049   typedef shared_ptr<Method> method_pointer;
00050   typedef std::map<pair<string,int>, shared_ptr<Method> > method_container;
00051         base_factory() {}
00052         virtual ~base_factory() {}
00053 
00054 
00055         void add_method(string sname, shared_ptr<Method> m, int index = 0)
00056         {
00057     std::pair<string,int> name(sname,index);
00058     if(methods.find(name) != methods.end())
00059                         cerr << "\n LBANN Warning, method list already has a method pointer associated with \""
00060             << name.first << " at index " << name.second << "\", not added to method list\n";
00061                 else
00062                         methods[name] = m;
00063         }
00064 
00065   //remove method()
00066 
00067         shared_ptr<Method> get_method(string sname, int index = 0)
00068   {
00069     std::pair<string,int> name(sname,index);
00070     return methods[name];
00071         }
00072 
00073   protected:
00074 
00075   method_container methods;
00076 
00077 }; //end base_factory class
00078 
00079 } //end lbann namespace
00080 
00081 #endif // LBANN_BASE_FACTORY_HPP
